job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Primary Responsibilities
Develop automation to create and maintain systems in DC and cloud
Manage access to systems like ipa, knowledge with okta asa will be prefer
Design and develop tools for system management, monitoring, analysis, etc.
Experience with monitoring and automation tools further help analyze real time issues.
Familiar with system hardening and server security best practices
Working with the Lead Engineer to understand application functionalities and verification requirements; working with Software Engineering to define a scalable real time testing and monitoring strategies
Lead troubleshooting and monitoring efforts with production/non-production systems.
Knowledge/skills
Programming: Bash Scripting, Python
Source Control: git
Build: Jenkins, Pipeline
OS hardening: cobbler,packer, kickstart
Security: iptables, firewalld, SSH, TLS, IAM
Network: tcpdump, ngrep, wireshark
Systems: Linux: CentOS, Amazon linux
Cloud skill: AWS, packer, terraform
Monitoring: Zabbix, Prometheus, Grafana, ELK
Configuration: Ansible, Terraform
AWS Services: S3, DynamoDB, RDS, Route53, VPC, cloudfront, etc.
Common Services: nginx,keepalived, Kubernetes, Bind dns,LVS, ntp,
Virtualization: KVM
